column2: CalAmp Corp. engages in delivering of wireless access and computer technologies. The company is headquartered in Irvine, California and currently employs 882 full-time employees. The firm operates through two business segments: Telematics Systems and Software & Subscription Services. Telematics Systems segment offers a series of Mobile Resource Management (MRM) telematics products and applications. The Software & Subscription Services segment offers cloud-based application enablement and telematics service platforms. The firm has facilities in various locations, including Carlsbad, California; Torrance, California; Herndon, Virginia; Waseca, Minnesota; Eden Prairie, Minnesota, and Auckland, New Zealand.
